main event: A child was burned in a suspected UFO-related incident in New Mexico on July 3, 1964.
interesting points: The child reportedly saw a bluish light and heard a buzzing sound as an unidentified object hovered over him,Multiple witnesses described the child's burn injuries, with concern expressed by medical staff regarding the nature of the burns,An attempt to analyze hair and skin samples was made, but results were not available at the time of the report,The child's condition worsened overnight despite initial perceptions of minor injuries,A police investigation indicated no other physical evidence of the alleged UFO was found in the area.
sighted object: an unidentified object emitting a bluish light
witness description: Charles Hickman and his grandson, with additional input from family members.
